vehicles.name: Steam Landship
vehicles.desc: A ground vessel the size of a small ship, driven by steam and crawling across the landscape on tracks or wheels. She carries troops, guns, and the confidence of an industrial civilisation.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built landship for immediate steampunk land-warfare scenarios. The centrepiece of any Victorian military campaign.

vehicles.name: Clockwork Carriage
vehicles.desc: A carriage driven by wound springs and mechanical precision. She needs no coal, no water, and no horses — just someone to wind the mainspring every few hours.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built clockwork carriage for immediate steampunk travel. Silent, reliable, and elegantly mechanical.

vehicles.name: Aerial Gunboat
vehicles.desc: A steam-powered dirigible carrying broadside cannons. She floats above the battlefield and rains fire on positions that have no answer to attack from the sky.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built aerial gunboat for immediate steampunk air support. She changes the battlefield by existing.
